name: FabPic
description: Lightweight graphics editor that transforms screenshots into polished visuals with backgrounds, annotations, and export presets

opengraph.title: FabPic: All-in-One Social & Marketing Graphics – Pay Once, Use Forever
opengraph.description: Create stunning social and marketing visuals in seconds. FabPic is the powerful yet simple graphics editor for marketers, founders, and creators—lifetime access for a single payment, all features unlocked.

opengraph.twitter_description: Create stunning social and marketing visuals in seconds with FabPic's powerful yet simple graphics editor for teams and creators.
